text:
Clinc | Software Engineers | Ann Arbor & SF | Onsite, Full-time & internships | https://clinc.com

Clinc builds the world's most advanced conversational AI for enterprise companies. We're a post-series A startup that has raised $8M, growing quickly (team & revenue!), and is partnered with some of the largest financial institutions around the globe.

We have several engineering roles open in our downtown Ann Arbor HQ as well as in our SF office in Fidi:

  * Full-stack software engineer
  * Data scientist
  * Front-end web engineer
  * iOS engineer
  * Android engineer
Learn more at: https://clinc.com/careers.html
